headline: Western Digital Corporation (WDC): I’ve Seen It At “8 Times Earnings,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 13 Stocks That Jim Cramer Discussed. Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) is a computer hardware company that provides storage devices such as hard disks. It is one of the top-performing stocks of 2025 in terms of percentage gains. Western Digital […]

headline: Seagate Technology Holdings plc (STX) Has Historically Traded At A Big Discount To The S&P, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 13 Stocks That Jim Cramer Discussed. Seagate Technology Holdings plc (NASDAQ:STX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Seagate Technology Holdings plc (NASDAQ:STX) is a computer hardware firm whose shares have gained 128% year-to-date to beat peer and rival Western Digital’s stock.
